amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: \ PROHIBITION AGAINST DIRECT FUNDING FOR CERTAIN COUNTRIES \ SEC. __. None of the funds appropriated or otherwise made available pursuant to this Act shall be obligated or expended to finance directly any assistance or reparations to Cuba, Libya, North Korea, Iran, Saudi Arabia, or Syria.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section to the bill relating to a prohibition against direct funding for certain countries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weiner amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 231 (Roll no. 428).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Weiner.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Weiner amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 231 (Roll no. 428).
